dict.acceptation: 非常；差不多；很多地；很大程度上；
很多；大量；很好的东西；（与不可数名词连用，尤用于否定句，或与 how 连用以询问数量，也可与 as、so 和 too 连用）许多；

sent.orig: In positive statements it is used generally with only, much and a lot.
sent.trans: 若用于肯定式陈述句中，通常与only,much和alot连用。

sent.orig: We have seen too much defeatism,too much pessimism,too much of a negative approach.
sent.trans: 我们看到太多的失败主义、太多的悲观主义和太多的负面倾向。

sent.orig: Because there is too much civilisation, too means of subsistence, too much industry, too much commerce.
sent.trans: 因为社会上文明过度，生活资料太多，工业和商业太发达。

sent.orig: The three foundations of learning: seeing much, suffering much and studying much. -- atherall.
sent.trans: 求学的三个基本条件是：多观察，多吃苦，多研究。--加塞罗尔。

sent.orig: Too much exercise, too much coffee or too much alcohol are bad. In moderation are beneficial.
sent.trans: 应该是“过量的运动，过量的咖啡或过量的酒清都是对人体有害的，但是适量的这些是对人体有益的。”
